name: Wikipedia for reading
description:
- Non-destructive
- Reduces the paragraph width to book format.
- Makes links only visible when hovering the paragraph/list containing the link
- Highlights links when focused
- Uses (default) serif font with increased font size
- Increases content font size.

Use the browser settings to change the font to the one you like.
additional_info:
## Change log ##

### 2016-04-30 ###

- hide [Edit] links
- increase content font size

### 2016-06-11 ###

- highlight links when focused
- apply stylesheet to other wikis too (domains starting with "wiki." or containing "-wiki")

### 2016-06-26 ###
- changed additionally recognized domains to those containing "wiki." or ending with "wiki"
